Music module¶

class music.Music(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.cog.Cog

Cog for music related commands .. method:: music()

Main group for music commands

join(ctx)¶

Joins users channel

ctx (commands.Context) - Context

leave(ctx)¶

Leaves channel

ctx (commands.Context) - Context

play(ctx, query)¶

Searches YouTube for query, returns top 10 selections, allows user to choose which track, and plays the song.

ctx (commands.Context) - Context

query (str) - Query

async connect_to(guild_id: int, channel_id: str)¶

Connects to the channel

async on_ready()¶
on_ready():

Called when bot is ready to serve content. This confirms that self.bot.user exists. Initializes the lavalink client.

async track_hook(event)¶

Leaves channel when queue is empty

music.setup(bot)¶

Setup the cog
